subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Fernando Jara, all of 18 years old, drove Invasor brilliantly down the lane to prevail by a nose in the Grade I $750,000 Whitney Handicap.
snippet: Fernando Jara, all of 18 years old, drove Invasor brilliantly down the lane to prevail by a nose in the Grade I $750,000 Whitney Handicap.
